Divine Intelligence.quote: "The divine mind is the supreme intelligence that pervades all existence." (Plotinus, Enneads V.1)

Cosmic Consciousness.quote: "In the beginning was the Word, and the Word was with God, and the Word was God." (John 1:1)

Divine Wisdom.quote: "Wisdom has built her house, she has hewn out her seven pillars." (Proverbs 9:1)

Universal Mind.quote: "The universe is a thought of the deity." (Friedrich Schelling)

Divine Understanding.quote: "Understanding is the reward of faith. Therefore, seek not to understand that you may believe, but believe that you may understand." (Augustine of Hippo)

Eternal Thought.quote: "That which is never born and never dies, that is pure consciousness." (Upanishads)

Divine Knowledge.quote: "Knowledge is as infinite as the stars in the sky." (Ramakrishna)

Supreme Intellect.quote: "The Active Intellect is the cause of existence." (Maimonides, Guide for the Perplexed)

Divine Contemplation.quote: "Contemplation is the highest form of activity." (Aristotle, Nicomachean Ethics)

Infinite Mind.quote: "The infinite mind contains all possibility." (Giordano Bruno)

Divine Reflection.quote: "As above, so below; as below, so above." (Hermes Trismegistus)

Cosmic Mind.quote: "The cosmos is within us. We are made of star-stuff. We are a way for the cosmos to know itself." (Carl Sagan)

Divine Cognition.quote: "In Him we live and move and have our being." (Acts 17:28)

Transcendent Thought.quote: "Beyond thought, beyond mind, beyond consciousness lies the ultimate truth." (Ramana Maharshi)

Sacred Knowledge.quote: "Knowledge is light in the heart." (Ali ibn Abi Talib)

Divine Ideas.quote: "The world of ideas lies within the divine mind." (Plato)

Divine Consciousness.quote: "Consciousness is the foundation of all being." (Vedanta)

Divine Insight.quote: "The eye through which I see God is the same eye through which God sees me." (Meister Eckhart)

Cosmic Intelligence.quote: "The universe is not only queerer than we suppose, but queerer than we can suppose." (J.B.S. Haldane)

Divine Memory.quote: "Remember Me, and I will remember you." (Quran 2:152)

Divine Awareness.quote: "Awareness is the power that is concealed within the present moment." (Eckhart Tolle)

Supreme Thought.quote: "As a man thinketh in his heart, so is he." (Proverbs 23:7)

Divine Philosophy.quote: "Philosophy is the science of the divine." (Aristotle)

Sacred Intelligence.quote: "The intelligence of the universe is sacred." (Native American wisdom)

Divine Truth.quote: "Truth is one, paths are many." (Mahatma Gandhi)

Cosmic Understanding.quote: "To understand all is to forgive all." (Buddha)
